channel.title: Int on players
channel.description:
Well, I'm making a fight pits and I got it 90% done.
The problem is, the server only checks to see if there is players in the area, not how many there is.
I tried adding to the timer a + 1 for ever player it tele's in, but it didn't work, for some reason it would add in a extra number.
Basically what I'm looking for is a int to put in process that will increase by 1 every time the player enters the pits, and decrease then they leave.

item.title: Int on players
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Doesn’t matter if you put:

use = ;lakdsjf;ladfja;ldsfja;dslfkjads;lfj;adslkfjads;dfklajds;lfkj

It’s still going to add something extra to that number. :\

Read full topic
